local_intent: Lower until table contact, verify contact, place the red_square on the table with neutral yaw, release, and retreat.
assumptions: red_square is already grasped and above the place area
Robot is at the designated place region and clear to descend
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase: verifies object in gripper, performs LowerUntilContact with specified params, confirms contact, then PlaceOnSurface at yaw 0 with press_force 10, opens gripper, and retreats as in GLOBAL_BT and description.
